movies.title: Finding Neverland
movies.plot: During a writing slump, playwright J.M. Barrie meets a widow and her three children—who soon become an important part of Barrie’s life and the inspiration that lead him to create his masterpiece. Peter Pan'.

events.title: Peter Pan is a success on its opening night
